scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "node server" "npm run styl:dev"
scripts.prod: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production node server
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node webpack && npm run styl:prod
scripts.deploy:major: npm version major && npm run build && gh-pages -d public
scripts.deploy:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && gh-pages -d public
scripts.deploy:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && gh-pages -d public
